cols=['Age','Goals','Assists','Penalty_Attempted','Perc_Passes_Completed','Yellow_Cards','Red_Cards']
for i in cols:
    x=pd.DataFrame(df.groupby('Club')[i].sum().reset_index(drop=False).sort_values(by=i,ascending=True))
    plt.figure(figsize=(20,10))
    sns.barplot(x='Club',y=i,data=x,palette="seismic_r")
    plt.title('The most {} in the EPL 2020 - 2021'.format(i),fontsize=20)

    plt.xticks(rotation=90)
    plt.ylabel('count of {}'.format(i),fontsize=18)
